content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Mining and Smelting Setup (around -28, -60)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position -28.0, -61.0)
- Burner inserter (position -28.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace (position -27.0, -59.0)

### Iron Plate Production Line (around -23, -58)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace (position -23.0, -58.0)
- Stone furnace (position -21.0, -58.0)
- Burner inserter (position -20.5, -59.5)
- Wooden chest (position -24.5, -58.5) containing iron and copper plates
- Burner inserter (position -25.5, -58.5)
- Burner inserter (position -22.5, -56.5)
- Wooden chest (position -22.5, -55.5) for output storage

### Iron Mining Complex (around -8, -59)
Consists of:
- Three burner mining drills (positions -10.0/-59.0, -8.0/-59.0, -6.0/-59.0)
- Multiple wooden chests for storage (positions -9.5/-57.5, -7.5/-57.5, -5.5/-57.5)
- Multiple burner inserters for item movement
- Transport belt network connecting components

### Main Production Line (around 0,0)
Consists of:
- Four stone furnaces (positions 0.0/0.0, 2.0/0.0, 4.0/0.0, 6.0/0.0)
- Input wooden chests (positions 0.5/-2.5, 2.5/-2.5, 4.5/-2.5, 6.5/-2.5)
- Output wooden chests (positions 0.5/2.5, 2.5/2.5, 4.5/2.5, 6.5/2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters for material movement
- Extensive belt system connecting different parts

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities in occupied spaces
- Check if the target position is free before placing new entities
- Ensure the drop positions of mining drills don't overlap with other entities

### Resource management errors
- Verify coal availability in inventory before attempting to insert fuel into machines
- Keep track of fuel levels in burner devices to maintain continuous operation

### Entity placement optimization
- Consider the space requirements of connected entities when designing production lines
- Leave adequate space between production units to allow for inserters and belts

### Output handling
- Ensure proper output collection mechanisms are in place before starting production
- Set up storage solutions before activating mining or processing operations
